presentation.title: Arcanis Boat Club
presentation.subtitle: 10,000 boats await their captain.
presentation.desc1: The Arcanis Boat Club is Arcanis' first project based on generative art. Generative art is a practice using algorithms to autonomously generate a work. First, you create rules that set limits on the creation process. Then a computer follows these rules to produce new works.
presentation.desc2: Arcanis plans to deliver a series of 10,000 unique boats sailing on the ethereum blockchain.
presentation.desc3: Each NFT is unique and is based on the physical art of Arcanis Design !

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.desc: To thank you for inflating our sails, we have prepared a magnificent roadmap for you full of great surprises and gifts! With each percentage of sales reached, exclusive offers and gifts await you! Join this adventure and be part of the OTE movement: Own To Earn

1.title: Physical artwork Giveaway
1.desc: 50 owners will be offered a physical work! These pieces, true generative works of art, will be the physical representation of one of the NFTs owned by the owner !

2.title: Radio LoFi
2.desc: The Arcanis Boat Club gets its own lofi radio on YouTube and twitch which broadcasts it 24 hours a day ! Come and enjoy the creative atmosphere of the Club and let yourself be inspired.

3.title: Luxury accessories Giveaway
3.desc: Members of the Arcanis Boat Club will be selected at random in order to be offered luxury accessories such as rolex (value 10 k), Dior, Chanel, Louis Vuitton, Hermes accessories in connection with the boat creations !

4.title: Youtube artwork Giveaway
4.desc: From this level all the works of the youtube channel will be offered to random members of the club

5.title: Merchandising
5.desc: Arcanis Boat Club's e-shop openig ! Come and discover exclusively the line of merchandise specially reserved for the Arcanis Boat Club's members !

6.title: Physical NFTs
6.desc: Each NFT will be released in a physical version at a price of 150$ purchasable only by the Arcanis Boat Club's members. Each drawing will be accompanied by an nfc chip !

7.title: Final Giveaway
7.desc: A final gift of $ 100,000 will be reserved for a random member of the Arcanis Boat Club! It's worth finishing this roadmap, isn't it?
